page.title: 18Sports Facilities
page.content: Horse Riding: There are several stables fields and tracks, some for training and some for show-jumping, and some for fun. Riding is mostly for the farmers but there is a riding school also. There are two golf courses which are well-supported. Sailing: There are facilities for sailing and windsurfing on flooded clay and gravel pits, but these are fairly expensive pastimes. Shooting: This is popular and caters for many people most of whom belong to clubs. Fishing: The lakes and flooded quarries provide managed facilities for individuals and several clubs. Wildernesse Sports Centre: Facilities for squash, tennis etc. are available to the public at evenings and weekends. There are also soccer, cricket and hockey leagues.
